name: Terminus. The secret of Proxima 4 Colony.
name_original: Terminus. The secret of Proxima 4 Colony.
description:
The year is 2089. Thanks to the invention of antimatter engine, mankind has established first colonies in the nearby stars. With one of them - Proxima 4, contact was lost after 2 years of the drilling crew landing.

You are a robot - Terminus model 2055BH, your mission it to investigate the situation with the colony.

Eliminating enemy robots, solving puzzles and going deeper into the planet you discover the secret of the universe.
